name: Parsnip and Potato Puree
keywords: fall, parsnip, potato, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and core the parsnips. Cut them in one-and-a-half-inch pieces and simmer in boiling water until tender.
Peel the potatoes and cook until tender. Drain and mash together with the parsnips. Heat the cream with the butter and add. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
